Out of `{python} penguins_crosstabbed.sum().sum().item()` penguins, our model misclassified `{python} round(penguins_crosstabbed_mismatch.sum().sum().item() / penguins_crosstabbed.sum().sum().item(), 2) * 100`% of the penguins.

The model has these parameters:

- Number of Clusters: `{python} model_1_params["n_clusters"]`

- Max Iterations: `{python} model_1_params["max_iter"]`


```{python}
# | output: false
import plotnine as pn
penguins_clust_long = pd.melt(penguins_selected,
                              id_vars=["bill_length_mm", "flipper_length_mm"],
                              var_name="measure",
                              value_name="group")

pn_scatter_clustering = (
    pn.ggplot(penguins_clust_long, pn.aes("bill_length_mm",
                                          "flipper_length_mm", color="factor(group)"))
    + pn.geom_point()
    + pn.facet_wrap("measure")
)
pn_scatter_clustering.save('scatter-clustering.png',
                           width=6, height=4, dpi=300)
```
